Text: Thank you for posting!  I know this is an inconvenient request, but could you please collect the 50 issues in a single torrent?  This is a lot of overhead.  Thanks in advance!
Thanks for upload :) any chance you could upload 'legends of the dark knight' #21 and #22? Thanks again:)
coyb85, I don't think Legends of the Dark Knight #21 and #22 have been scanned yet.  When they are, it'll be uploaded. :)
Legends 21+22 are digitals. Until two weeks ago they went up like clockwork every Thursday.
